text: Madelaine Petsch is the actor / redhead / villain / heroine / human of my dreams. I mean, aside from being phenomenal as Cheryl Blossom in Riverdale, Petsch is also a makeup and skin addict, talking quite candidly about her beauty routine in interviews. The most recent product favorite of Petsch â€™ s? A $ 14 eyebrow gel. Yes, that's finally something you can afford. The Details In a video posted to her YouTube channel, Petsch broke down her summer beauty look with a makeup tutorial, showing fans exactly how she conceals her skin ( with Tarte Shape Tape, of course ), contours her eyes ( with Wander Beauty Catch the Light Highlighter ), and, of course, fills in her signature thick brows.
